name: Valve Hammer Configuration File
summary: Learn about .WC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create, remove, rename, or copy a WC file, click "Edit" and select the appropriate action (New, Remove, Rename, Copy).
NOTE: Hammer Editor is included in the Source game engine SDK.

description: File created by Valve Hammer Editor, a mapping tool for the Goldsource engine that runs games such as Counter-Strike and Half-Life; contains configuration information for compiling maps into formats that are usable in the Source engine; configurations include Default, Fast, HDR Full Compile, Run Map in Engine Fullscreen, and more.
